index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF DESIGN CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, repealing the moratorium adopted by Ordinance 119487 as amended, amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 23.55.003, 23.55.030, 23.55.034, 23.55.036, 23.55.040, 23.66.160, 23.66.338, 23.69.021, 23.84.036 and adding a new section 23.55.005, Video Display Methods, to regulate use of video display on signs.
